::DrillBit/KitKat2::

DrillBit turned the situation over in his head. The base had been
infiltrated by enemy bots, who had a deadly virus. There was a bot out
side, who supposedly has the virus and the cure. He also had backup on
the way.

KitKat tryed to think of a way out.
"The easiest thing would be to kill the intruders, now, and wipe out the
guy outside before his friends get here," says KitKat.

"In theory." DrillBit states, turning to Killfest and Shivah.
"What do you two think?"
